original_text: But David said to Saul, ‘Sir, I have been a shepherd who takes care of his father's sheep. Sometimes a lion or a bear would come to take a lamb from among the sheep.
korean_text: 다윗이 사울에게 말하되 주의 종이 아버지의 양을 지킬 때에 사자나 곰이 와서 양 떼에서 새끼를 물어가면

sentences.original_text: who takes care of his father's sheep
Sometimes a lion or a bear would come
sentences.korean_translation: 때로는 사자나 곰이 올 때가 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: to take a lamb from among the sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 양들 중에서 어린 양을 데려가기 위해
